shows.title: Tin Can Cooking
shows.desc:
We are so excited to welcome Jack Monroe back to the Chef's Table this year with her new bestseller Tin Can Cook. She’ll be showing us how to make delicious, budget-friendly food that would grace any dinner table - all from tins.

Jack is an activist, political commentator and author of 4 bestselling cookery books including the recently published Tin Can Cook.

In association with Trussell Trust

shows.title: What is a Campaigner?
shows.desc:
Activist, change maker, good Samaritan or champion for change - there are many words to describe a campaigner. This joint workshop with The Trussell Trust and End Hunger UK looks to explore the many ways to be a campaigner, and give participants a taste of what they can do to create change.

In association with Trussell Trust

shows.title: Peak Inequality and Food Bank Use
shows.desc: The Trussell Trust’s CEO Emma Revie will be talking with Danny Dorling on his latest book Peak Inequality, and how we can create a future without the need for food banks in the UK.
